TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DeleteFolderType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseRequestType

summary.span: 类表示邮箱中删除文件夹的请求。

span.span: The class represents a request to delete folders from a mailbox.

span.para: 使用要删除非托管的文件夹和托管的文件夹类型。不能删除默认文件夹，如收件箱或已删除邮件文件夹中，使用此操作。
Use the type to delete unmanaged folders and managed folders. You cannot delete default folders, such as the Inbox or Deleted Items folders, by using this operation.
下面的代码示例显示两个文件夹软删除。
The following code example shows the soft-deletion of two folders.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 构造函数初始化的新实例类。

span.span: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property ExchangeWebServices::DisposalType DeleteType { ExchangeWebServices::DisposalType get(); void set(ExchangeWebServices::DisposalType value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置一个枚举，介绍如何删除文件夹。

span.span: The property gets or sets an enumeration that describes how folders are deleted.

span.para: The following are the possible values for the enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::BaseFolderIdType ^> ^ FolderIds { cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::BaseFolderIdType ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::BaseFolderIdType ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 属性获取或设置一组文件夹邮箱中删除文件夹标识符。

span.span: The property gets or sets a set of folder identifiers for folders to delete from a mailbox.

summary.span: 此属性获取或设置一套对象。

span.span: This property gets or sets a set of objects.

value.span: 属性返回数组，其中包含要创建的所有文件夹。

span.span: The property returns a array that contains all the folders to create.
